PhD STUDIES (3rd cycle studies)

University of Lodz does not offer PhD programmes in foreign languages.

Foreign students wishing to undertake PhD studies at University of Lodz can do this only on individual basis (in a foreign language, but not within regular study programmes).

Rules of applying for PhD studies at the University of LodzÂ
